docs.snippet: A federal judge has upheld a Missouri law requiring protesters to stay at least a football-field length away from funeral sites, beginning an hour before they start until an hour after the services end....

docs.snippet: Two children of the disappeared know the nature of endless loss....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two children of the disappeared know the nature of endless loss.
docs.abstract: Roger Cohen Op-Ed column relates stories of Gonzalo Reggiardo Tolosa and his girlfriend Jimena Vicario, children of parents who were 'disappeared' during Argentina's Dirty War in late 1970s; notes both have endured an endless sense of loss as they pursue the truth of their parents' death.

docs.snippet: The intimate atmosphere of the 89-year-old Rose Hill Gym may be undeniable, but some Fordham fans say that it is hampering basketball recruiting....
docs.lead_paragraph: The intimate atmosphere of the 89-year-old Rose Hill Gym may be undeniable, but some Fordham fans say that it is hampering basketball recruiting.
docs.abstract: Fordham’s 89-year-old Rose Hill Gym is a venerable throwback, one of the few facilities still in use that were built during the lifetime of basketball’s inventor, James Naismith; but some fans are grumbling that Rose Hill, for all its charms, is one reason the men’s basketball team has had trouble attracting talent.

headline.main: At Fordham, Gym Has History if Not Allure
headline.print_headline: At Fordham, Gym Has History if Not Allure
